resources.string: Alert! The room temperature has dropped to 15°C please turn on the heating to maintain comfort

EcoThermostat App Overview

 Home Page
 - City Weather: View current city weather, click for details, and change cities.
 - Room Control: Overview and on/off for room systems. Access detailed controls when on.

 Room Control Interface
 - Current Temperature: Display room temperature.
 - Set Temperature: Adjust with -/+ buttons.
 - Climate Control: Toggle on/off.
 - Timer: Set auto off timer.
 - Save Settings: Click save, wait for changes to reflect.

 Navigation Bar
 - Home: Return to home screen.
 - Status: View room temperatures.
 - Statistics: Energy usage over time, presence of room members.
 - Settings: User details, notifications, FAQ, educational resources, logout.

 Efficient Climate-Control Practices

 - Thermostat Settings: 20°C in winter, 25°C in summer.
 - Insulation: Proper insulation and sealing leaks.
 - Ventilation: Ensure good airflow.
 - Maintenance: Regular HVAC checks and clean ducts.
 - Energy-Efficient Appliances: Use Energy Star-rated systems.

 Resources
 - Energy-Efficient Heating and Cooling: https://www.energy.gov/energysaver/guide-energy-efficient-heating-and-cooling
 - Energy Star: https://www.energystar.gov/
 - ASHRAE: https://www.ashrae.org/

 Default Temperatures
 - Living Room: 21°C
 - Bedroom: 16°C
 - Kitchen: 27°C
 - Bathroom: 22°C ```

Q1: How can I set the temperature in my home?
A: Use the Status button at the navigation bar at the bottom and select your preferred room.

Q2: Can I schedule heating for different rooms?
A: Yes, with the Timer feature available in each room.

Q3: Is remote control possible?
A: Absolutely, control from anywhere with internet access.

Q4: How does the app save energy?
A: Switch on Climate Control for the Best Energy Efficiency.

Q5: Does it integrate with smart devices?
A: Yes, seamless integration with various devices.

Q6: What to do if I face technical issues?
A: Check out Learn with us in the app or contact support.

Q7: Can I view usage history?
A: Yes, explore usage patterns in Statistics

Q8: Is it available for iOS and Android?
A: Yes, available on both platforms.
